system.description:
This spell provides breathable air in a volume of 8,000 cubic feet (such as a 20' x 20' x 20' room) for 1 hour per caster level.

Stationary Use: Typically cast in enclosed spaces, it remains in one area, providing air for all within.

Mobile Use: The spell can be cast on enclosed vehicles, living creatures, or items to travel with them, including underwater or in airless environments. For example, a pegasus-rider could cast it on themselves and their mount to travel into outer space. Stealthy movement underwater is impossible due to visible air bubbles.

The spell does not protect against poison gases unless the gas is a natural atmospheric component.
